properties.query:
let ReconCommands = dynamic([
    "ifconfig", "whoami", "uname", "ps", "netstat", "ping", "traceroute", "nmap",
    "ipconfig", "arp", "route", "nslookup", "dig", "hostname", "curl", "wget",
    "lsof", "ss", "tcpdump", "nc", "netcat", "find", "dir", "ls", "pwd", 
    "echo", "env", "systeminfo", "tasklist", "getmac", "dsquery", "sc", 
    "wmic", "powershell", "arp", "certutil", "at", "schtasks", "net", 
    "nbtstat", "vssadmin", "quser", "query", "gpresult", "powershell -command", 
    "powershell -encodedcommand"]);
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine has_any (ReconCommands)
| extend ReconCommand = extract("(?i)(ifconfig|whoami|uname|ps|netstat|ping|traceroute|nmap)", 1, 
                                coalesce(ProcessCommandLine, InitiatingProcessCommandLine)) 
| summarize 
    CommandCount = count(),
    ReconCommandsExecuted = make_set(ReconCommand)     
    by AccountUpn, TimeGenerated, DeviceName, MachineGroup
    | where CommandCount > 2
| project TimeGenerated, AccountUpn, CommandCount, ReconCommandsExecuted, DeviceName, MachineGroup
